djangotailoring.views¶

Contents:

  • djangotailoring.views.tailoring
    • Views
      • Base Views
      • Public Views
    • Mixins
  • djangotailoring.views.protection
    • Mixins
  • djangotailoring.views.localized
    • Search Order
      • Localized Document Dictionaries
      • Example
    • Views
      • Base Views
      • Public Views

The views package of djangotailoring has three modules that contain generic views for different scenarios.

  • djangotailoring.views.tailoring contains views for rendering templates with content derived from one or more message documents.
  • djangotailoring.views.localized contains views that extend the views in the tailoring module by supporting the selection of message document based on an individual’s selected locale.
  • djangotailoring.views.protection contains a view mixin useful for restricting access to a page to logged-in users.
